pages.text: Legend has it that the horses of Beyond the Horizon were blessed by a wandering druid, giving them remarkable abilities. $(br2)They can now swim through water like majestic seahorses and pass through leaves with the grace of a ghost. $(br2)No more getting stuck on branches or falling off your horse when it touches water! Your trusty steed is now the ultimate off-road vehicle.
Ride bareback (a bit slower, and rather uncomfortable) or craft your own saddle for the perfect galloping experience!
